description: Gets information about the lifecycle hooks for the specified Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: AutoScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: LifecycleHookNames
parameters.description: The names of one or more lifecycle hooks. If you omit this property, all lifecycle hooks are described. (string) ---

nested_items.name: LifecycleHooks
nested_items.description: The lifecycle hooks for the specified group.

nested_items.name: LifecycleHookName
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle hook.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group for the lifecycle hook.

nested_items.name: NotificationTargetARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target that Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling sends notifications to when an instance is in a wait state for the lifecycle hook.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that allows the Auto Scaling group to publish to the specified notification target (an Amazon SNS topic or an Amazon SQS queue).

nested_items.name: NotificationMetadata
nested_items.description: Additional information that is included any time Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling sends a message to the notification target.

nested_items.name: HeartbeatTimeout
nested_items.description: The maximum time, in seconds, that can elapse before the lifecycle hook times out. If the lifecycle hook times out, Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling performs the action that you specified in the DefaultResult property.

nested_items.name: GlobalTimeout
nested_items.description: The maximum time, in seconds, that an instance can remain in a wait state. The maximum is 172800 seconds (48 hours) or 100 times HeartbeatTimeout, whichever is smaller.

nested_items.name: DefaultResult
nested_items.description: The action the Auto Scaling group takes when the lifecycle hook timeout elapses or if an unexpected failure occurs.
